data.title: Marriage of Philippe I de France and Bertrade de Montfort
data.text:
Test tabs title

Try out the class selector

1 of 6

1/5 Navigate

Search the system for something you're looking for.

Pinch and zoom on the map to see areas in more detail (or use the +/- controls)

Slide across the timeline at the bottom of the page to see what is happening across the world at different times

Click on a marker to find out more

2 of 6

2/5 Console

Read more about the Oiko.world project, the data entry process and the technical specifications, as well as T&Cs. You can also replay tours at any time from the main menu.

See the different kinds of data available in Oiko.world, filter what you want to see, as well as catch up on recent discussions about entries

See the full information for each entry, as well as bookmark entries for later comparison.

3 of 6

3/4 Activity Panel

Send us your feedback on Oiko.world

Track your journey through Oiko.world and see your list of bookmarked entries

Contribute to discussions

By setting up an account and logging-in to Oiko.world (it's free!) you can join discussions on individual entries

4 of 6

4/5 Information

Click on the Info icon when something on the map is selected for information about this entry.

Info See information relating to the selected item.

Discuss Read and contribute to the discussion about the selected item.

Share Share a link to the selected item on social media.

Click on this to add this item to your Added Events

5 of 6

5/5 Comparative Timeline

Don't forget - the map view is only the half of Oiko.world!

Press this button to see the ancient world through a different lens in the Comparative Timeline.

6 of 6

1/5 Navigate

Search the system for something you're looking for to add to your timeline. You can add multiple entries to compare what is happening in different places at the same time (and delete any at any time).

Pinch and zoom on the timeline to see shorter or longer periods of time

Slide across the timeline bar at the bottom of the page to change the focus of your timeline, or set the boundary markers to cover a particular period

Click on an entry in any of your timelines to find out more about each one

1 of 5

2/5 Console

Read more about the Oiko.world project, the data entry process and the technical specifications, as well as T&Cs. You can also replay tours at any time from the main menu.

See the different kinds of data available in Oiko.world, filter what you want to see, as well as catch up on recent discussions about entries

See the full information for each entry in your timelines, as well as bookmark entries for later comparison.

2 of 5

3/5 Activity Panel

Send us your feedback on Oiko.world

Track your journey through Oiko.world and see your list of bookmarked entries

Contribute to discussions

By setting up an account and logging-in to Oiko.world (it's free!) you can join discussions on individual entries

3 of 5

5/5 Map

Don't forget - the timeline view is only the half of Oiko.world!

Press this button to see the ancient world through a different lens in the Map view.

5 of 5
